desc.en: 正月前的某一天，亞瑠特地將[USERNAME]老師約出來，並向他分享自己的租和服計畫。因為敵不過和服店店員的話術，亞瑠的租和服預算嚴重超支。
desc.jp: 正月前的某一天，亞瑠特地將[USERNAME]老師約出來，並向他分享自己的租和服計畫。因為敵不過和服店店員的話術，亞瑠的租和服預算嚴重超支。
desc.zh_cn: 正月前的某一天，{cf亚瑠}特地将[USERNAME]老师约出来，并向他分享自己的租和服计划。因为敌不过和服店店员的话术，{cf亚瑠}的租和服预算严重超支。

long.jp: ゲヘナ学園

desc.en: The fourth track in Blue Archive OST, with rhythm cheerful and bright. It is often used in many stories.
desc.jp: The fourth track in Blue Archive OST, with rhythm cheerful and bright. It is often used in many stories.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第四首曲子，节奏欢快明亮，在各种故事剧情中都很常出现。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.jp: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.zh_cn: 在大起大落的事情里外，我们总需要一点闲适的时间来放松自己的神经。举例/联想：Lemonade Diary、Nesno wons；特征是较为温柔。

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.jp: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。

desc.en: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.jp: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.zh_cn: 有些时候，停下来饮杯茶也不错。举例/联想：Cherry Merry Berry
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

desc.en: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.jp: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.zh_cn: 有些时候，停下来饮杯茶也不错。举例/联想：Cherry Merry Berry
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

name.en: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
name.jp: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
name.zh_cn: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)

long.jp: ゲヘナ学園

desc.en: 在連假結束前，淳子來到了老師所在的夏萊。兩人一起去市區欣賞聖誕樹和逛商店街。淳子的肚子突然冒出咕嚕嚕的聲音，兩人一起吃了糰子後互相說新年快樂。
desc.jp: 在連假結束前，淳子來到了老師所在的夏萊。兩人一起去市區欣賞聖誕樹和逛商店街。淳子的肚子突然冒出咕嚕嚕的聲音，兩人一起吃了糰子後互相說新年快樂。
desc.zh_cn: 在连假结束前，{cf淳子}来到了老师所在的{et夏莱}。两人一起去市区欣赏圣诞树和逛商店街。{cf淳子}的肚子突然冒出咕噜噜的声音，两人一起吃了团子后互相说新年快乐。

long.jp: ゲヘナ学園

desc.en:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.jp:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.zh_cn:
蔚蓝档案OST的第十七首曲子，常在“商店”页播放，也是优香回忆大厅的主题曲。
曲子的标题在日语中意为“欢迎”，即当你走进一家商店或餐厅时所会听到的问候语。

name.en: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
name.jp: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
name.zh_cn: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)

desc.zh_cn: 等下，接下来要发生什么？！举例：第137首曲子

name.zh_cn: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)

long.jp: ゲヘナ学園

desc.en: 今天是一年的最後一天，老師和佳世子為了參加敲鐘活動來到了神社。但很遺憾的是，活動因為鐘樓狀況不佳而取消了。老師和佳世子在回程時沒能搭上末班車，後來只好在車站聽著首班車的信號鐘聲迎接新年。
desc.jp: 今天是一年的最後一天，老師和佳世子為了參加敲鐘活動來到了神社。但很遺憾的是，活動因為鐘樓狀況不佳而取消了。老師和佳世子在回程時沒能搭上末班車，後來只好在車站聽著首班車的信號鐘聲迎接新年。
desc.zh_cn: 今天是一年的最后一天，老师和{cf佳世子}为了参加敲钟活动来到了神社。但很遗憾的是，活动因为钟楼状况不佳而取消了。老师和{cf佳世子}在回程时没能搭上末班车，后来只好在车站听着首班车的信号钟声迎接新年。

long.jp: ゲヘナ学園

name.en: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
name.jp: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
name.zh_cn: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)

long.jp: ゲヘナ学園

desc.en: 在地鐵站偶然遇到老師的和香，說明了自己觀測雲的計畫。
desc.jp: 在地鐵站偶然遇到老師的和香，說明了自己觀測雲的計畫。
desc.zh_cn: 在地铁站偶然遇到老师的{cf和香}，说明了自己观测云的计划。

long.jp: レッドウィンター連邦学園

desc.en: The 12th track in Blue Archive, used especially in the "Story" page and its subpages, as well as at the end of every story (To Be Continued).

desc.en: 如願和老師約會的若藻，把自己事先計畫好的約會行程告訴老師，然而由於各種突發狀況，兩人的約會計畫最終徹底泡湯。相當失望的若藻在老師的安慰之下很快便重新振作起來。
desc.jp: 如願和老師約會的若藻，把自己事先計畫好的約會行程告訴老師，然而由於各種突發狀況，兩人的約會計畫最終徹底泡湯。相當失望的若藻在老師的安慰之下很快便重新振作起來。
desc.zh_cn: 如愿和老师约会的{cf若藻}，把自己事先计划好的约会行程告诉老师，然而由于各种突发状况，两人的约会计划最终彻底泡汤。相当失望的{cf若藻}在老师的安慰之下很快便重新振作起来。

long.jp: 百鬼夜行連合学院

desc.en: Aris meets with Millennium students who cheer her on, and discusses the Sword of Light with members of the Engineering Department. She enjoys every moment of it. Afterwards, Aris runs into Neru and they visit an arcade to enjoy some video games together. Though they were once enemies against each other, Aris is now proud to declare Neru as her party member.
desc.jp: Aris meets with Millennium students who cheer her on, and discusses the Sword of Light with members of the Engineering Department. She enjoys every moment of it. Afterwards, Aris runs into Neru and they visit an arcade to enjoy some video games together. Though they were once enemies against each other, Aris is now proud to declare Neru as her party member.
desc.zh_cn: {cf爱丽丝}和{sn千年}的学生们见面后，学生们给予了加油，和{cn工程师部}见面后则聊了「光之剑」，度过了愉快的时光。后来{cf爱丽丝}遇见{cf宁瑠}，两人一起去游戏中心开心地玩游戏。虽然两人曾经是兵戎相见的关系，但现在{cf爱丽丝}也能笑着说{cf宁瑠}是自己的同伴。

desc.en: Aris met other Millennium students at the school square and she was welcomed and greeted with great delight. Aris was even given some "side quests" and received some snacks as the "mission" reward.
desc.jp: Aris met other Millennium students at the school square and she was welcomed and greeted with great delight. Aris was even given some "side quests" and received some snacks as the "mission" reward.
desc.zh_cn: {cf爱丽丝}在{sn千年}广场遇到了{sn其他}{sn千年}的学生，大家都很高兴见到她。中途{cf爱丽丝}还收到了几个支线任务，被以报酬的名义赠送了点心。

desc.en: The fourth track in Blue Archive OST, with rhythm cheerful and bright. It is often used in many stories.
desc.jp: The fourth track in Blue Archive OST, with rhythm cheerful and bright. It is often used in many stories.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第四首曲子，节奏欢快明亮，在各种故事剧情中都很常出现。

long.jp: ミレニアムサイエンススクール

desc.en: Aris met the three of the Engineering Department. The three said they were out seeking for some new equipments. Utaha asked the conditions of the Sword of Light, Aris said that it was kept with her utmost care.
desc.jp: Aris met the three of the Engineering Department. The three said they were out seeking for some new equipments. Utaha asked the conditions of the Sword of Light, Aris said that it was kept with her utmost care.
desc.zh_cn: {cf爱丽丝}在校园里见到了{cn工程师部}三人，后者表示是出来搜罗新装备的。{cf咏叶}问{cf爱丽丝}光之剑近况如何，{cf爱丽丝}则表示在很爱护地使用着。

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.jp: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。

long.jp: ミレニアムサイエンススクール

desc.en:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.jp:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.zh_cn:
蔚蓝档案OST的第十七首曲子，常在“商店”页播放，也是优香回忆大厅的主题曲。
曲子的标题在日语中意为“欢迎”，即当你走进一家商店或餐厅时所会听到的问候语。

name.en: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
name.jp: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
name.zh_cn: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)

long.jp: ミレニアムサイエンススクール

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.jp: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.zh_cn: 干就完了，奥利给！举例/联想：System All Green

long.jp: ミレニアムサイエンススクール
ミレニアムサイエンススクール

desc.en: Aris met more people at other places, until she saw a familiar figure at the subway.
desc.jp: Aris met more people at other places, until she saw a familiar figure at the subway.
desc.zh_cn: {cf爱丽丝}在更多地方见到了更多的人，直到在车站遇见了一个熟悉的身影。

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.jp: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。

desc.en: Being called "little" angered Neru, but still she dragged Aris and Sensei to an arcade store. As expected, Aris defeated Neru. Though Aris had already been teaching her for quite a while, Neru was still pretty frustrated when hearing that Aris said she was playng bad. Despite all of this, she asked Aris to teach her combos.
desc.jp: Being called "little" angered Neru, but still she dragged Aris and Sensei to an arcade store. As expected, Aris defeated Neru. Though Aris had already been teaching her for quite a while, Neru was still pretty frustrated when hearing that Aris said she was playng bad. Despite all of this, she asked Aris to teach her combos.
desc.zh_cn: {cf爱丽丝}叫{cf宁瑠}“小不点”让后者颇为不满，但还是拽着老师和{cf爱丽丝}到了游戏厅。不出所料，{cf宁瑠}不断输给了{cf爱丽丝}，尽管{cf爱丽丝}已经教了她相当一段时间。{cf宁瑠}虽然非常恼火{cf爱丽丝}评价她的水平不好，但还是请教{cf爱丽丝}连招的操作。
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子
等下，接下来要发生什么？！举例：第137首曲子

desc.en: neru aris arcade game store shop indoor artificial light room
desc.jp: neru aris arcade game store shop indoor artificial light room

desc.en: Aris started teaching uneasily. Neru, while cursing, restarted the game again and again, but remained unsuccessful after a long time. Then, Akane came.
desc.jp: Aris started teaching uneasily. Neru, while cursing, restarted the game again and again, but remained unsuccessful after a long time. Then, Akane came.
desc.zh_cn: {cf爱丽丝}有些不安地开始了教学。{cf宁瑠}一边骂着一边不服气地重新开始一次次战局，但即便过了很久还是没成。这时，{cf朱音}来了。
等下，接下来要发生什么？！举例：第137首曲子

desc.en: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.jp: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.zh_cn: 有些时候，停下来饮杯茶也不错。举例/联想：Cherry Merry Berry

desc.en: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.jp: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.zh_cn: 在大起大落的事情里外，我们总需要一点闲适的时间来放松自己的神经。举例/联想：Lemonade Diary、Nesno wons；特征是较为温柔。

name.en: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
name.jp: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
name.zh_cn: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)

desc.en: Though still pretty upset, Neru was dragged out by Akane and forced to leave. Akane also mentioned about the mission assigned by Rio.
desc.jp: Though still pretty upset, Neru was dragged out by Akane and forced to leave. Akane also mentioned about the mission assigned by Rio.
desc.zh_cn: 虽然{cf宁瑠}仍然很不服气，但{cf朱音}还是强行把{cf宁瑠}给拖走了，并且还提到了{cf莉音}所下达的任务。
等下，接下来要发生什么？！举例：第137首曲子

desc.en: neru aris arcade game store shop indoor artificial light room
desc.jp: neru aris arcade game store shop indoor artificial light room

desc.en: Sensei was surprised to see that Aris wasn't afraid of Neru. Sensei was glad to get to know Aris' daily life. Though didn't complete Yuzu's assignment, Aris still felt happy. And she said that a hero will not give up easily.
desc.jp: Sensei was surprised to see that Aris wasn't afraid of Neru. Sensei was glad to get to know Aris' daily life. Though didn't complete Yuzu's assignment, Aris still felt happy. And she said that a hero will not give up easily.
desc.zh_cn: 老师对{cf爱丽丝}居然不害怕{cf宁瑠}感到惊讶，而{cf爱丽丝}则表示是因为{cf宁瑠}现在已经是个伙伴了。老师对能了解{cf爱丽丝}的生活感到开心。虽然没能完成{cf柚子}布置的任务，但{cf爱丽丝}还是很开心，并且表示勇者是不会轻易放弃的。

name.en: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
name.jp: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
name.zh_cn: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)

desc.en: The 64th track from Blue Archive, a widely recognized song for its appearance with the Game Development Department story. It has become the de facto identity and theme song for the GDD and its members.
desc.jp: The 64th track from Blue Archive, a widely recognized song for its appearance with the Game Development Department story. It has become the de facto identity and theme song for the GDD and its members.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第64首曲子，于“游戏开发部”相关章节中广泛使用。其已经成为游戏开发部及其成员实质上的标志性曲目。

long.jp: ミレニアムサイエンススクール

desc.en: This page lists the chapter numbers and titles of all main story.
desc.jp: This page lists the chapter numbers and titles of all main story.
desc.zh_cn: 本页列出所有的主线故事的篇号及标题。

desc.en: This page lists the chapter numbers and titles of all main story.
desc.jp: This page lists the chapter numbers and titles of all main story.
desc.zh_cn: 本页列出所有的主线故事的篇号及标题。

desc.en: This page lists the chapter numbers and titles of all main story.
desc.jp: This page lists the chapter numbers and titles of all main story.
desc.zh_cn: 本页列出所有的主线故事的篇号及标题。

desc.en: While tending to an unconscious Momoi, Sensei is contacted by Midori and heads to the Game Development Department where Aris has shut herself in. In spite of Sensei's placating words, Aris reproaches herself for putting Momoi in danger. At that moment, an unexpected visitor arrives with an unsettling revelation.
desc.jp: While tending to an unconscious Momoi, Sensei is contacted by Midori and heads to the Game Development Department where Aris has shut herself in. In spite of Sensei's placating words, Aris reproaches herself for putting Momoi in danger. At that moment, an unexpected visitor arrives with an unsettling revelation.
desc.zh_cn: 老师原本在照顾失去意识的{cf桃井}，接获{cf绿}的联系后，便去找窝在{cn游戏开发部}的{cf爱丽丝}。尽管老师给予了安慰，但{cf爱丽丝}依旧因为自己伤害了{cf桃井}而很自责。就在那个时候，出乎预料的人物现身告知了「真相」。

desc.en: In the midst of the battle against Aris, Momoi fell. Though she was sent to Schale's infirmary in time, Momoi remained unconscious even after a few days. The mystery of Aris shrouded over everyone's head, and Sensei started recalling all the infos provided by everyone.
desc.jp: In the midst of the battle against Aris, Momoi fell. Though she was sent to Schale's infirmary in time, Momoi remained unconscious even after a few days. The mystery of Aris shrouded over everyone's head, and Sensei started recalling all the infos provided by everyone.
desc.zh_cn: 在与{cf爱丽丝}的混战中，{cf桃井}不幸倒地。虽然及时送到了{et夏莱}的医务室，但几天后仍未苏醒。关于{cf爱丽丝}的谜团如阴云般笼罩着每个人的心头，老师开始回忆起所有人提供的信息与线索。

desc.en: The 55th track in Blue Archive, notable in Volume 3. It is also connected with Azusa, who was regretting badly for "killing" members of Arius Squad.
desc.jp: The 55th track in Blue Archive, notable in Volume 3. It is also connected with Azusa, who was regretting badly for "killing" members of Arius Squad.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST的第五十五首曲子，在第三篇故事中尤为明显。其经常与梓联系起来，后者当时与阿里乌斯(奧利斯)小队作战时因自己“杀了人”而自责。

desc.en: Yuzu and Midori requested help from Sensei for the fact that Aris locked herself up in the club room all day long. Sensei called once softly outside the club room, and walked in despite no response.
desc.jp: Yuzu and Midori requested help from Sensei for the fact that Aris locked herself up in the club room all day long. Sensei called once softly outside the club room, and walked in despite no response.
desc.zh_cn: {cf柚子}和{cf绿}向老师请求协助，{cf爱丽丝}一直待在{cn游戏开发部}的活动室里不肯出来。老师轻轻喊了一声，见没回应便走了进去。

long.jp: ミレニアムサイエンススクール
ミレニアムサイエンススクール

realname.zh_cn: 机械迷林(High-Tech Full On Mix)

desc.en: Aris blamed herself for the harm she had done to everyone, especially Momoi. Aris said that she didn't know what happened, but her body responded automatically, as if a hidden game save file was loaded and activated.
desc.jp: Aris blamed herself for the harm she had done to everyone, especially Momoi. Aris said that she didn't know what happened, but her body responded automatically, as if a hidden game save file was loaded and activated.
desc.zh_cn: {cf爱丽丝}对自己给众人，尤其是{cf桃井}的伤害自责不已。{cf爱丽丝}表示自己也不清楚发生了什么，但身体却自动做出了反应，如同隐藏的存档被激活一般。

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.jp: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。

long.jp: ミレニアムサイエンススクール

desc.en: When Aris was having great trouble speaking, Rio suddenly broke into the room. She claimed that she would tell everyone the true behind all of these.
desc.jp: When Aris was having great trouble speaking, Rio suddenly broke into the room. She claimed that she would tell everyone the true behind all of these.
desc.zh_cn: 就在{cf爱丽丝}讲不下去话的时候，{cf莉音}突然闯了进来。她声称将要为所有人道出这一切的真相。

long.jp: ミレニアムサイエンススクール
ミレニアムサイエンススクール

realname.zh_cn: 机械迷林(High-Tech Full On Mix)

desc.en: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.
desc.jp: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 莉央是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 莉音是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 莉音是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。

desc.en: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.

desc.zh_cn: 在大起大落的事情里外，我们总需要一点闲适的时间来放松自己的神经。举例/联想：Lemonade Diary、Nesno wons；特征是较为温柔。

desc.en: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.
desc.jp: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 莉央是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 莉音是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。
